title: Morning Glory Time
completion_message: Good job! Put down some time every day on your calendar to come here to practice. Set up some reminders. Commit and stick to the plan. You can do this!

title: Add the program to my routine
completion_message: Great plans! Next, let’s do a practice to help bringing awareness to your parenting values by imagining your child’s 30th birthday party.

title: Your Child's 30th Birthday
completion_message: It’s very important to remember your values and be the kind of person you want to be. The Healing Hearts app is here to help you infuse your values into your everyday life.

title: What brought you to this program?
Body Scan
completion_message: Did you notice any pleasant, neutral, or unpleasant sensations in the body? Pay attention to how these sensations change throughout today!

title: How did the body scan go?
Body Scan
completion_message: Body scan is an important practice in this program. Congrats on doing it again! Did you notice any pleasant, neutral, or unpleasant sensations in the body this time? Pay attention to how these sensations change throughout today!

title: What is mindfulness?
completion_message: Mindfulness is not what we think. It is simple but not easy: paying attention to the present moment nonjudgmentally, with intention.

title: Journaling Activity
completion_message: Congrats on earning today’s petal! You also just unlocked two bonus activities! If you care to, give them a try and build your mindfulness muscles.
